annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for the final time to end this match.
Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) receives a well played pass inside the penalty area and shoots. His effort sails well wide of the left post.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Pepe (Real Madrid) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Jesus Gil Manzano ignores the protests.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 4 min. of added time.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Jesus Gil Manzano shows a yellow card to Mario Gaspar (Villarreal), who isn't surprised as the tackle was really hard and late.
Wasted opportunity. Jonathan dos Santos (Villarreal) gets to the rebound inside the box and smashes the ball just wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner but it's cleared.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Gareth Bale is substituted due to injury. Zinedine Zidane gives a chance to Lucas (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: The game is interrupted now, Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) picks up a knock and the physio has to come on.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) decides to strike the ball towards goal, but his effort fails to threaten the goalkeeper after being blocked by one of the defenders. Real Madrid win a corner.
Cedric Bakambu (Villarreal) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Marcelo produces a beautiful lofted cross into the box, where Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) rises high to head the ball low into the middle of the goal and beyond the goalkeeper. He makes it 2:3.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) tries to create a chance, but puts too much weight on his pass.
A cross by Marcelo (Real Madrid) from the side of the pitch flies into the box, but fails to find its intended target as the aim was poor.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Real Madrid take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
Isco (Real Madrid) fails to find any of his teammates inside the box as his pass is blocked. The linesman points to the corner flag, Real Madrid are going to take it.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: This corner kick is taken with a short pass by Toni Kroos (Real Madrid).

Marcelo (Real Madrid) sends a lofted cross into the penalty area. Unfortunately for him, the opponent's defence deals with his cross comfortably and intercepts it. Real Madrid have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Here is a change. Karim Benzema is going off and Zinedine Zidane gives the last tactical orders to Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The substitution is prepared. Rodrigo Hernandez (Villarreal) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Manuel Trigueros.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Although Gonzalez Soberon Alvaro (Villarreal) is just on the bench, Jesus Gil Manzano has awarded him with a yellow card. Unsporting behavior says the referee.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) fires the penalty inside the left post.

annotations.label: y-card

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Having seen unsporting behavior, Jesus Gil Manzano shows a yellow card to one of the players sitting on the bench. And Roberto Soldado (Villarreal) is the recipient.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) will take the responsibility and he is already preparing the ball.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The whistle blows and Bruno (Villarreal) is booked for an infringement.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Bruno (Villarreal) changes the direction of the ball using his hand, but he is angry when the referee gives a foul against him. A penalty is awarded to Real Madrid!
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.
This shall not pass! Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) lines up a shot from the edge of the box and goes for goal, but the effort is well blocked by a defender.
Cedric Bakambu (Villarreal) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) unleashes a shot, but his effort is poor and floats high over the bar.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Daniel Carvajal sends a superb cross into the box. Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) latches on to it and from close range plants a header inside the left post, leaving Andres Fernandez beaten. He displayed his eye for goal there excellent finish. The score is 2:1.
Samu Castillejo (Villarreal) has an effort on goal, but he misses to the right of the goal.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.
Real Madrid are enjoying a spell of pressure at the moment, but one of the defenders gets it clear. Corner kick. Real Madrid will have an opportunity.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) receives a lofted pass from the side and shoots from around the penalty spot, but the ball flies onto the right post!
What a chance that is! Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) displays good awareness near the penalty spot to get on the end of a cross, but he sends his header narrowly wide of the left post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Zinedine Zidane has decided to make a change. Isco (Real Madrid) replaces Casemiro.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It's time for a substitution. Denis Cheryshev (Villarreal) comes on in place of Adrian.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal Cedric Bakambu (Villarreal)! Cedric Bakambu (Villarreal) was put through by Bruno and he showed brilliant composure inside the box to fire into the bottom left corner. 2:0.
Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) is disappointed with himself because he got into a good area but produced a poor cross.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) whips in the resulting set piece but it's cleared.
Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender.
Samu Castillejo (Villarreal) fouls an opponent during an attacking move.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Manuel Trigueros (Villarreal) fires the rebound inside the left post after the ball breaks to him in the box. The score is 1:0.

Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) connected with a pass around the edge of the box, aimed and shot. His attempt went low towards the middle of the target, but Andres Fernandez was alert and the score remained the same.

Pepe (Real Madrid) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jonathan dos Santos (Villarreal) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.
Samu Castillejo (Villarreal) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. Villarreal force a corner. They send men into the box.

Karim Benzema (Real Madrid)'s poor effort is easily saved by Andres Fernandez. He connects well with a cross, but mistimes it a little, and it heads towards the middle of the target and straight into the grateful hands of the goalkeeper.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Problems for Francisco Escriba as Sergio Asenjo is not able to play anymore. His injury is too serious and Andres Fernandez (Villarreal) replaces him.
A bullet header by Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) from inside the box has the power, but goes totally in the wrong direction, yards wide of the right post.

Cedric Bakambu (Villarreal) blows a good opportunity. He has a lot of space around him and fires a terrific shot from the edge of the box towards the middle of the goal, but the goalkeeper makes a brilliant save and stops this one!
Samu Castillejo (Villarreal) gets on the end of a cross from Jaume Costa, but his shot goes a whisker over the crossbar.
A cross from Adrian (Villarreal) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Jonathan dos Santos (Villarreal) is intercepted by the defence.

The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Jonathan dos Santos (Villarreal). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate. Good work from Villarreal as they win a corner.

Jonathan dos Santos (Villarreal) missed a great opportunity! He finds himself some space near the penalty spot and plants a header goalwards which lacks both power and accuracy. The ball goes well wide of the right post!
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) sends over a cross from the side into the penalty area in order to find one of his teammates, but he fails and the opportunity goes begging.
Sergio Asenjo (Villarreal) is able to continue to play.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Sergio Asenjo (Villarreal) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) attempts to convert a lofted cross as he jumps high and heads the ball towards the roof of the net. Andres Fernandez shows his brilliant reflexes and pulls off a glorious save to stop the ball from hitting the net.
